intent.user_query: Find the customers who have only purchased one type of product.

phases.goal: Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT c.CustomerID, c.FirstName, c.LastName FROM fitness_db.Customers c JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON c.CustomerID = s.CustomerID JOIN fitness_db.SaleDetails sd ON s.SaleID = sd.SaleID GROUP BY c.CustomerID, c.FirstName, c.LastName HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT sd.ProductID) = 1;

arguments.sql: SELECT c.CustomerID, c.FirstName, c.LastName FROM fitness_db.Customers c JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON c.CustomerID = s.CustomerID JOIN fitness_db.SaleDetails sd ON s.SaleID = sd.SaleID GROUP BY c.CustomerID, c.FirstName, c.LastName HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT sd.ProductID) = 1;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
